answers.answer: Your immune system is down so it makes you more prone to have them. I thankfully only had one so far and it was because I didn't pee after sex. Just make sure you wipe front to back and pee before and after sex because that can cause UTIs. Also drink lots and lots of water to keep your system clean

.I always wipe from front to back and pee right after sex and sometimes before. I normally drink water sometimes I drink juice when I have dinner but for the most part I stay away from juice and soda. I just don't understand why I keep getting them...I don't hold my pee that much
Gestational diabetes can be a reason, ph balance, not enough ventilation (cotton panties are helpful), the way you clean down there, different soaps, and the list goes on unfortnantly

List does go on trust me that's all I've had since I've been pregnant .. Just try to drink water as much as you can it seems to flush out the bacteria . I'm on antibiotics for my UTI cause it always comes & goes. My lead to a kidney infection & it wasn't fun. Never hold your pee try not to eat or drink a whole bunch of sugar too, that seems to trigger it .

question: What causes you to have frequent UTI'S during pregnancy? I've had several and I have one again. I'm not sure if they aren't clearing up or what
title: Frequent UTI
